Welcome, %1$s! The temple of Phaidros is a ruin, not used for anything much. But the young of the village go there, now and then, on a dare, as it were. Some they there are things to be discovered there.
So, it has been a while... You gave most of your things to your family, as is proper, and start anew.
The lower parts of the temple are REALLY not mapped. Maybe there are more steps leading downwards?
Sometimes you find chests. Most of them can be opened safely with a double tap. Often they contain useful magic items.
Sometimes you have to hurry. Time is already running!
Sometimes it is dark. But you\'ll manage, I\'m sure..
There a certain elements down there that want to attack you.
A taste of things to come.

The way back is very arduous. Fortunately, every now and then there are steps leading directly to the surface. Once you have found such a way, you can always use it as a shortcut on your next way down.
From now on you are on your own. You probably don\'t know everything you need to know, but everything that is known in the village. Maybe you will want to go down in a group next time, too?
You are very brave to go deeper.

This game is a dungeon simulator. 

After some tutorial levels, you can go as deep as you want, alone or with up to three fellow travellers. You can pick up treasures and magic items, must avoid traps and monsters. 

If you want to play together with others, you must be in the same local network. One of you starts the server for a number of players (1-4), the players enter the IP address and connect to the server. The game starts when everybody has connected. Going down or up is only possible when everyone agrees to it.
